Text: AWESOME! saw this movie on tv like 20 years ago and havent been able to find it since, really loved it when i saw it first time. Great stuff, thousand thanx lord_terabyte for making this available here!

I've DL'ed this twice and the voice/dialogue track does not play using VLC or Quicktime. The soundtrack plays correctly but no voices. Even the subtitles work... This is the first time this has happened to me. I'd appreciate any help... I love this film and would very much like to see it again. Thanks
Tried the reverse stereo under audio channels and found the voice track, but about 3x slower than the film speed, when I increase the playback the vocals become more or less clear... any suggestions?

I also cannot hear the voices (the background sounds are there).

This is my all-time favorite movie. Please someone fix this problem. :-(

Video/Audio + subs worked great for me! Thank You!

voice + background audio is normal and in sync.
I use kmplayer for windows, it is better than vlc.
Hi, please allow download.  Thank you!
